description.displayText: When vetting Mariam, she provided references  promptly and communicated with me. Mariam was great with my son, she arrived on time, she played, sang and entertained him while I worked out of my office. We intended to have her long-term but the nanny we used in the past had become available consistently after being under the impression she was no longer available. I still would recommend Mariam for any parent looking for a nanny or a as an elder caretaker.
